contract is abstract and requires implementation of several methods for configuring a new guardian and recovering an account contract.","kind":"dev","methods":{"acceptanceSubjectTemplates()":{"details":"This function is virtual and should be implemented by inheriting contracts to define specific acceptance subject templates.","returns":{"_0":"string[][] A two-dimensional array of strings, where each inner array represents a set of fixed strings and matchers for a subject template."}},"completeRecovery(address,bytes)":{"details":"This function must be implemented by inheriting contracts to finalize the recovery process.","params":{"account":"The address of the account to be recovered.","completeCalldata":"The calldata for the recovery process."}},"computeAcceptanceTemplateId(uint256)":{"details":"Encodes the email account recovery version ID, \"ACCEPTANCE\", and the template index, then uses keccak256 to hash these values into a uint ID.","params":{"templateIdx":"The index of the acceptance subject template."},"returns":{"_0":"uint The computed uint ID."}},"computeEmailAuthAddress(address,bytes32)":{"details":"This function utilizes the `Create2` library to compute the address. The computation uses a provided account address to be recovered, account salt, and the hash of the encoded ERC1967Proxy creation code concatenated with the encoded email auth contract implementation address and the initialization call data. This ensures that the computed address is deterministic and unique per account salt.","params":{"accountSalt":"A bytes32 salt value defined as a hash of the guardian's email address and an account code. This is assumed to be unique to a pair of the guardian's email address and the wallet address to be recovered.","recoveredAccount":"The address of the account to be recovered."},"returns":{"_0":"address The computed address."}},"computeRecoveryTemplateId(uint256)":{"details":"Encodes the email account recovery version ID, \"RECOVERY\", and the template index, then uses keccak256 to hash these values into a uint256 ID.","params":{"templateIdx":"The index of the recovery subject template."},"returns":{"_0":"uint The computed uint ID."}},"dkim()":{"details":"This function is virtual and can be overridden by inheriting contracts.","returns":{"_0":"address The address of the DKIM contract."}},"emailAuthImplementation()":{"details":"This function is virtual and can be overridden by inheriting contracts.","returns":{"_0":"address The address of the email authentication contract implementation."}},"extractRecoveredAccountFromAcceptanceSubject(bytes[],uint256)":{"details":"This function is virtual and should be implemented by inheriting contracts to extract the account address from the subject parameters.","params":{"subjectParams":"The subject parameters of the acceptance email.","templateIdx":"The index of the acceptance subject template."}},"extractRecoveredAccountFromRecoverySubject(bytes[],uint256)":{"details":"This function is virtual and should be implemented by inheriting contracts to extract the account address from the subject parameters.","params":{"subjectParams":"The subject parameters of the recovery email.","templateIdx":"The index of the recovery subject template."}},"handleAcceptance((uint256,bytes[],uint256,(string,bytes32,uint256,string,bytes32,bytes32,bool,bytes)),uint256)":{"details":"This function validates the email auth message, deploys a new EmailAuth contract as a proxy if validations pass and initializes the contract.","params":{"emailAuthMsg":"The email auth message for the email send from the guardian.","templateIdx":"The index of the subject template for acceptance, which should match with the subject in the given email auth message."}},"handleRecovery((uint256,bytes[],uint256,(string,bytes32,uint256,string,bytes32,bytes32,bool,bytes)),uint256)":{"details":"Verify the provided email auth message for a deployed guardian's EmailAuth contract and a specific subject template for recovery. Requires that the guardian is already deployed, and the template ID corresponds to the `templateId` in the given email auth message. Once validated.","params":{"emailAuthMsg":"The email auth message for recovery.","templateIdx":"The index of the subject template for recovery, which should match with the subject in the given email auth message."}},"isActivated(address)":{"details":"This function is virtual and should be implemented by inheriting contracts.This function helps a relayer inactivate the guardians' data after the account inactivates the controller (this contract).","params":{"recoveredAccount":"The address of the account to be recovered."},"returns":{"_0":"bool True if the account is already activated, false otherwise."}},"recoverySubjectTemplates()":{"details":"This function is virtual and should be implemented by inheriting contracts to define specific recovery subject templates.","returns":{"_0":"string[][] A two-dimensional array of strings, where each inner array represents a set of fixed strings and matchers for a subject template."}},"verifier()":{"details":"This function is virtual and can be overridden by inheriting contracts.","returns":{"_0":"address The address of the verifier contract."}}},"title":"Email Account Recovery Contract","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"acceptanceSubjectTemplates()":{"notice":"Returns a two-dimensional array of strings representing the subject templates for an acceptance by a new guardian's."},"completeRecovery(address,bytes)":{"notice":"Completes the recovery process."},"computeAcceptanceTemplateId(uint256)":{"notice":"Calculates a unique subject template ID for an acceptance subject template using its index."},"computeEmailAuthAddress(address,bytes32)":{"notice":"Computes the address for email auth contract using the CREATE2 opcode."},"computeRecoveryTemplateId(uint256)":{"notice":"Calculates a unique ID for a recovery subject template using its index."},"dkim()":{"notice":"Returns the address of the DKIM contract."},"emailAuthImplementation()":{"notice":"Returns the address of the email auth contract implementation."},"extractRecoveredAccountFromAcceptanceSubject(bytes[],uint256)":{"notice":"Extracts the account address to be recovered from the subject parameters of an acceptance email."},"extractRecoveredAccountFromRecoverySubject(bytes[],uint256)":{"notice":"Extracts the account address to be
